title: Person of Interest - Kill them all
author: Novus Destiny
comment: There is nothing more scary... then the anger of a gentle man.
The only thing wrong with this scene is that no one hands Michael Emerson an emmy at the end.
this is an awesome scene... it shows how Finch, a nice pacific guy, who always is against guns and violence, turns into a complete different person, when the one he loves is in danger
For an actor typecast as villain, Michael Emerson did such a tremendous job as the protagonist on this show. Which made such moments simply brilliant.
